snippet: Ben Affleck was not prepared to go from early front-runner to late-season underdog with “Argo.”
abstract: Melena Ryzik The Carpetbagger observes that Ben Affleck, who was considered to be shoo-in for a best director nomination by the Oscars for his movie Argo, has been snubbed; notes that while movie has won best picture nomination, Affleck himself did not seem prepared to go from early front-runner to late-season underdog.
lead_paragraph: Ben Affleck was not prepared to go from early front-runner to late-season underdog with “Argo.”

headline.seo: Ben Affleck, Now an Underdog With ‘Argo,’ Is on the Rebound
headline.main: A Snub by Oscars? Affleck Has an Answer
headline.print_headline: A Snub By Oscars? Affleck Has An Answer
